metadata.name: IC Green 25 mg 1 Injection powder lyophilized for solution

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For Determining Cardiac Output Hepatic Function and Liver Blood Flow For ophthalmic angiography

contraindications.disease: Mouse LD50 60mg kg intravenous Rat LD50 87mh kg intravenous
